item.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Prep: 15 minutes Cook: 9 minutes Total: 25 minutes Servings: 8 cookies Ingredients 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 1/2 teaspoon baking soda 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter, softened 1/2 cup packed brown sugar 1/3 cup granulated sugar 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 egg 1 cup (6 ounces) Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels 1/2 cup chopped nuts (if omitting, add 1 to 2 tablespoons of all-purpose flour) Steps pre-heat oven to 375 Combine in small bowl: flour baking soda Beat in large bowl until creamy: butter sugar brown sugar vanilla extract Add egg to large bowl and beat well Gradually beat in small bowl contents to large bowl Stir in chocolate and nuts place 1/4 cup dollops on ungreased baking sheet Bake for 11-13 minutes until golden-brown Let cool on baking sheet source: Toll House Bag

item.title: Peanut Butter Cookies
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 10 minutes Total: 30 minutes Servings: 60 cookies Ingredients 16oz (475ml) smooth peanut butter 12oz (350ml) shortening 1 tablespoon (15ml) salt 4 eggs 4oz (120ml) milk 12oz (350ml) sugar 9oz (265ml) brown sugar 1 tablespoon (15ml) baking soda 24oz (.

item.title: Pumpkin Bread
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 70 minutes Total: 90 minutes Servings: 2 Loaves ![[attachments/pumpkinBread.png]] Ingredients 2 cups all-purpose flour, spooned into measuring cup and leveled-off 1/2 tsp salt 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp ground cloves 1 tsp ground cinnamon 1 tsp ground nutmeg 1-1/2 sticks (3/4 cup) unsalted butter, softened 2 cups sugar 2 large eggs 1 15-oz can 100% pure pumpkin (I use Libby’s) Steps Preheat oven to 325F grease two 8x4" loaf pans with butter dust pans with flour in a medium bowl, combine: flour salt baking soda baking powder cloves cinnamon nutmeg In mixer bowl, beat on medium speed: butter sugar once blended, add eggs one at a time, beating after each continue beating until light and fluffy beat in pumpkin add flour mixture and mix on low speed turn batter into pans dividing evenly bake for 65-75 minutes let cool for about 10 minutes source: https://www.
